question: Which of the following adds former American Express CEO Kenneth Chenault as its First Black Board Member?
explanation: Kenneth Chenault, Former CEO of American Express, joined Facebook's board, becoming the first African American Board Member of Facebook. Kenneth Chenault has vast experience in fields like customer service, direct commerce, etc. He retired from his CEO position in American Express in October 2017. He was also American Express' first black CEO. Facebook had been looking for an African American board member to fix its lack of diversity.
